translations: n.[数] 不变量；[计] 不变式

phrs.translation: 不变系统；不变量系统；无变系

sentences.sentence: "Once we scale up, algorithms must be sensitive to tiny changes in identities and at the same time invariant to lighting, pose, age," Kemelmacher-Shlizerman said.
sentences.translation: 凯梅尔马赫·施勒泽曼说：“一旦扩大规模，算法必须对身份的细微变化敏感，同时不受光照、姿势和年龄影响。”
清单2循环中包含不变式。

sentences.sentence: Determine which tasks are variant or invariant.
sentences.translation: 确定哪些是变量任务，哪些是非变量任务。
